---
title: "Sony"
description: "PTP Sony definitions"
---

# Sony

## RAW

**Code:** `0xb101`

For RAW File

**Category:** image

---

## HEIF

**Code:** `0xb110`

For HEIF File

**Category:** image

---

## MPO

**Code:** `0xb301`

For MPO File

**Category:** image

---

## MP4

**Code:** `0xb982`

For MP4 File

**Category:** video

---
